Q：洗唔洗首抽？
A：無首抽呢樣野，佢送個D係英雄卷可以直接揀(除左新英)！

Q：咁邊隻英最勁？
A：其實呢都係玩組合嘅，每一版每隻英強度都會變，
但我建議你揀樣黎玩，因為樣是一世的

Q：D武器點搞啊？點撚樣分？好撚亂啊
A：專武T10(得武器有專武)
黃(通常打RAID出)
紅(打RAID/商店金抽/鑽抽)
紫(打主線HARD MODE/商店金抽/鑽抽)
藍(用黎分解)
綠白(用黎分解)
By湯丸

A：試下轉手動，升下啲裝就ok架啦

Q：有冇公會？
A：有就有，不過長期爆人，等我地公會升左lv就會多返啲人數，各位巴打記住moon po
公會名：Lihkg

緊急維護內容
-超越技能變更
男弓超越4技能3暗效果變更為MP消耗+1, 驅散目標增益效果並減少目標1格MP
山丘超越3技能4暗效果變更為攻擊時驅散目標增益效果並在20s內使目標受到物理傷害+20%, CD 20s

-超越技能bug修復
修復了大奶超越5暗效果將同樣適用於超越2的恢復效果中

修復了男弓超越5暗效果觸發的技能1不觸發超越4效果的問題

-其他技能bug修復
修復了黃毛技能1不觸發無敵的問題
修復了柱子技能3第二次攻擊觸發2次的問題
修復了劍法技能3最後一擊倒地效果只有1s的問題

-物品bug修復
修復了鳥人專武易傷效果被歸為增益效果的問題
修復了咆哮虎像效果在對方免疫狀態異常時也會導致擊倒的問題

*由此次bug刷世界BOSS傷害的排名前100內的玩家累計傷害將回檔至使用bug前並反映到排位中
*下一周世界BOSS每日排位獎勵將翻倍
*維護結束後發放300鑽石

[Maintenance Details]

Maintenance Duration: Fri, 15th Sep 2017
America Server: 02:00-05:00 (UTC -4)
Asia Server: 13:00-16:00 (UTC +7)

** Please note that you cannot access to the game during the maintenance.
We will try our best to end it in time.
** As promised, 500 rubies will be delivered to your mailbox after the maintenance.
** To celebrate Thailand Launch 1 Year Anniversary, ‘Som Tam’ x1 and ‘Pad Tai’ x1
will be given as gift to everyone.

[Revamps]

▶Network & Server Stabilization
- Some of lag issues will be solved
:: Some of lag issues will be solved, including Raid.

▶ Guild re- join time will be changed after being kicked out
- It’s been revamped that now you won’t be able to re- join the guild for 24 hours after you’ve
been kicked out.

** Other bug fix details were posted yesterday.
You can refer them here

[Event Details]

▶ Item Summon Package Renewal
:: Period: Fri, 15th Sep after maintenance
:: Details: Special Item Summon x10 (1x), 500 rubies
:: Purchasable via “Event” tab in Special Shop

▶Loot Booster Package Renewal
:: Period: Fri, 15th Sep after maintenance
:: Details: Loot Booster x2, Upper Dungeon Key x5
** This package can be purchased max 4 times per month. Purchase record will be reset
at the beginning of every month.
:: It can be purchased via “Event” tab in Special Shop

▶ New Special Stamina Packages for Thailand Launch 1 Year Anniversary
:: Period: Fri, 15th Sep after maintenance – Wed, 27th Sep 24:00 (Server time)
** It’s been already a year since we launched King’s Raid in Thailand. To celebrate this,
we have added packages including Thailand related images.

:: Special Stamina Package 1
- Banana Roti (750 Stamina) x2, (Gold +50% for 30 min)
- Pang Yen (750 Stamina) x2, (EXP +50% 30 for 30 min)

:: Special Stamina Package 2
- Tom Yam Kung (1500 Stamina) x1, (Gold & EXP +50% for 60 min)
- Som Tam (1000 Stamina) x3, (Gold +50% for 60 min)
- Pad Tai (1000 Stamina) x3, (EXP +50% for 60 min)

** Each package can be purchased max 10 times during the event period
** Each food will be having special effects. They can be stacked with other boosters.
** Each Thai food can be stacked. You will have longer effect duration, but effects won’t be
stacked.

▶Veronica Package Reset
:: Period: Fri, 15th Sep after maintenance – 24:00, Wed 4th Oct 2017.
:: New items will be given to your mailbox every day for 2 weeks.
:: Can be purchased only once per account.
** Reward items will vanish after 21 days, even if you did not claim the rewards.

[To-be-updated next week]

:: New heroes will be added
- Cassandra (Priest)
- Oddy (Mechanic)
- Yanne (Archer)
:: Guild Raid – (Hard Mode) will be added
** T7 reward items will be added
:: Dragon Raid – (Hard Mode) will be added
** Newly added Hard Mode is different from Level Difficulty.
:: Enchant System will be added
- It will make users add Options to owned gears.
